title: Fort Donelson National Battlefield: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility         The Fort Donelson National Battlefield visitor center in February, 2015. Opened in 1962, as part of the 100th anniversary commemoration of the battle, it is rather typical of the "Mission 66" architecture popular in the NPS at the time. NPS  We warmly welcome you to Fort Donelson National Battlefield. You are truly a valued guest, and we want you visit to be memorable and special. In this section you will learn more about how the park is striving to make facilities accessible for all as much as we can.
